title: Wanna report a booster.
body: Hello there! I am Hosekinofunsaiki, or as some call me, Silver. Well. I got a message on my league account and they said they were boosted earlier today. Is there a way I can report them here? Or is there a way to report them on the league client itself? I have the message copied and saved if you wanna see it. This is mostly for the Rioters and all, but any info would be Fabulous.  {{champion:44}}

replies.body: Definitely be wary of who you add to your friend's list, and put them on block.  We will find these spams and take care of it!  If the message is from a friend or someone you know, let him know or put in a[ support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help with securing their account!  Thanks for helping to keep the community safe!
